shrimp.name: fBm4D
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: lacunarity
input.description: Controls the smoothness of the fBm

input.name: gain
input.description: Controls the contrast of the fBm

shrimp.usage: 4 dimensional fractional Brownian motion is a sumation of noises at different frequencies. Note that the output is not clamped and may exceed +1 or -1. The 4th dimension parameter defaults to the global variable "time", the current shutter time as defined by RiShutter. Note that "time"'s storage class is uniform.
